TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpMethodConstraint extends System.Object implements class System.Web.Routing.IRouteConstraint

summary.span: 在 ASP.NET 路由判斷 URL 是否符合路由時，讓您定義允許使用的 HTTP 動詞命令。

span.span: Enables you to define which HTTP verbs are allowed when ASP.NET routing determines whether a URL matches a route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您限制某些 HTTP 動詞命令符合路由。The class enables you to limit route matching to certain HTTP verbs. 比方說，您可以在其中指定的路由會被視為 url 相符項目時，才要求的 HTTP 動詞命令`POST`。For example, you can specify that a route is considered a match for a URL only when the HTTP verb for the request is `POST`. 若要設定路由比對的條件約束，您設定的屬性類別的執行個體類別。To set constraints for route matching, you set the property of the class to an instance of the class. 若要設定的 HTTP 動詞命令的條件約束，您可以設定一個字典項目的值物件和索引鍵的任何名稱。To set an HTTP verb constraint, you set the value of one dictionary element to an object and the key to any name. 在 方法，包括所有 ASP.NET 路由判斷路由是否符合 URL 時，路由不允許的 HTTP 動詞命令。In the method, you include all the HTTP verbs that are allowed for the route when ASP.NET routing determines whether the route matches a URL. ## Examples 下列範例所示物件，其屬性包含具有名為索引鍵的項目`httpMethod`且具有值的執行個體，這個值類別。The following example shows a object whose property contains an item that has a key named `httpMethod` and that has a value that is an instance of the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints/vb/Global.asax#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Routing

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the HTTP verbs that are allowed for the route.
